Package org.twelve.gateways

Interface TradeGateway

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryTradeGateway, JsonTradeGateway
    public interface TradeGateway
    A gateway for Trades that interacts with external storage.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean populate​(TradeRepository tradeRepository)
      Method that syncs the external storage information into the in-memory trades repository.
      boolean save​(int tradeId, boolean isPermanent, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> traderIds, java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> itemIds, int editedCounter, java.lang.String tradeStatus, java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> tradeCompletions, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String location, boolean newTrade)
      Method that syncs a local trade update to the external storage

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        boolean populate​(TradeRepository tradeRepository)
        Method that syncs the external storage information into the in-memory trades repository.
        Parameters:
        tradeRepository - local trades repository to populate
        Returns:
        whether or not the population was successful

      • save

        boolean save​(int tradeId,
             boolean isPermanent,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> traderIds,
             java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> itemIds,
             int editedCounter,
             java.lang.String tradeStatus,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> tradeCompletions,
             java.lang.String time,
             java.lang.String location,
             boolean newTrade)
        Method that syncs a local trade update to the external storage
        Parameters:
        tradeId - id of the trade
        isPermanent - whether or not the trade is permanent
        traderIds - list of account ids of trades involved in this trade
        itemIds - list of item ids that are involved in this trade
        editedCounter - number of times this trade has been edited
        tradeStatus - current status of this trade
        tradeCompletions - whether or not an item's trade has been completed in the same order as itemIds
        time - time of this trade
        location - location of this trade
        newTrade - true if it is a newly created trade. false if it is meant to update the external information
        Returns:
        whether or not the population was successful
